Deeplearning学习笔记

October 10, 2013

词向量

参考文章: 1. 《A Neural Probabilistic Language Model》Bengio大作.2003 2. 《Natural Language Processing (Almost) from Scratch》RonanCollobert 和 Jason Weston.2011。他们还把论文所写的系统开源了，叫做SENNA，3500 多行纯 C 代码也是写得非常清晰。 3. 《Three new graphical models for statistical language modelling》Hinton.2006 4. 《A scalable hierarchical distributed language model》Hinton.2008 5. 《Statistical Language Models based on Neural Networks》http://www.fit.vutbr.cz/~imikolov/rnnlm/
